file_summary: This XML file represents a JMeter test plan designed for performance testing a 'PetClinic' web application. It simulates user load by defining a Test Plan with user-defined variables for the application's host, port, and web context. A Thread Group is configured to simulate 500 concurrent users, each performing 10 iterations of a series of actions with a 10-second ramp-up time and a 300ms constant timer delay between requests. The test plan includes HTTP requests for various application pages such as the home page, CSS, JavaScript files, vets list, find owner page, viewing/editing owner details, adding new pets, and adding new visits. It utilizes counters ('count' and 'petCount') to dynamically generate unique owner and pet IDs for requests. The plan also includes HTTP cookie management, default HTTP request configurations, and result collectors (Aggregated report enabled, View Results Tree disabled) to gather performance metrics.
